org.sd.text.segment
Interface BooleanFeatureComputation

All Known Implementing Classes:
HasAnyFeature, HasDigitFeature, HasParseFeature, HasPatternFeature, PowerfulTermFeature
public interface BooleanFeatureComputation

Interface for computing a boolean feature for text.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 java.lang.Boolean computeFeature(java.lang.String text)
          Compute the boolean feature value for the text.
 java.lang.String getFeatureType()
          Get the feature type (or key).
 SegmentSequence split(java.lang.String text)
          Function to split the text in a way meaningul to an instance's computation.
 

Method Detail

getFeatureType

java.lang.String getFeatureType()
Get the feature type (or key).

computeFeature

java.lang.Boolean computeFeature(java.lang.String text)
Compute the boolean feature value for the text.

Returns:
true, false, or null if this computation does not apply to the text.

split

SegmentSequence split(java.lang.String text)
Function to split the text in a way meaningul to an instance's computation.

For example, term finders might split the text into the data before a key term, the key term, and the data after the key term.

Returns:
the segment sequence of the split text or null if unable or meaningless to split.
